title: Uber settles with family of victim in self-driving car crash
text:
Uber settles with family of victim in self-driving car crash 2:19pm EDT - 01:04 
The family of a woman killed by an Uber self-driving vehicle in Arizona has reached a settlement with the ride services company, ending a potential legal battle over the first fatality caused by an autonomous vehicle.   
The family of a woman killed by an Uber self-driving vehicle in Arizona has reached a settlement with the ride services company, ending a potential legal battle over the first fatality caused by an autonomous vehicle.  //reut.rs/2pUgjSa
